name: Alexandra Petru»ô
title: Products Strategist & Co-Founder
bio: Alexandra is an high impact product strategist with a track record of defining, launching and marketing star products. She is masterful at crafting product strategies that bridge the gap between business problems and technology. She has a great experience in startup and intrapreneurial environments, in leading Product (VP Product) & Organisational (Managing Director) roles. She is proud of being part of award-winning teams and businesses.
